activities.title: Morning Yoga Session
activities.tagline: Start your day with mindful stretching
activities.description: Wake up with a gentle 45-minute yoga session on our rooftop terrace. Suitable for all levels. Mats provided. Come in comfortable clothes and bring water.

activities.title: Thai Cooking Class
activities.tagline: Learn 3 authentic dishes with our chef
activities.description: Join our experienced Thai chef for a hands-on cooking experience. You'll learn to prepare Pad Thai, Green Curry, and Mango Sticky Rice. All ingredients and equipment provided. Vegetarian options available.

activities.title: Bar Crawl
activities.tagline: Explore the best local bars with us
activities.description: Join fellow travelers for a guided tour of the neighborhood's hidden gem bars. We'll visit 4 unique spots, each with a free welcome drink included. Make new friends and discover places you'd never find on your own!

activities.title: Pasta Night
activities.description: Our weekly community dinner! Fresh homemade pasta served in the common room. Vegetarian and gluten-free options available. Bring your own drinks and good vibes.
